item.description:
Join Stevie from the Providence French Language Meetup Group on March 31 at 6.45 pm for Un baiser s'il vous plait, the 6th (final!) film of the Salve Regina French Film Festival held in Newport RI.

All films are being shown to the public for no charge thanks to the support of the French American Cultural Exchange (FACE), the Cultural Services of the French Embassy and the French Ministry of Culture (CNC).

An RSVP limit of 15 will ensure we have enough seats in the theater given its freely available to all.

About the film
The Salve Regina French Film Festival website shows the following details for the screening of this film:
"Un baiser s'il vous plait/Shall We Kiss?"
•Date & Time: Date & Time: 7 p.m. Thursday, April 2
•Location: Bazarsky Lecture Hall, O'Hare Academic Center (Salve Regina, Ochre Point Rd, Newport RI)
A funny, oddly sexy and quintessentially French romantic comedy.
-----------
Further details about the film (taken from the website of Music Box Films at http://www.musicboxfi...
directed by Emmanuel Mouret
starring Virginie Ledoyen, Emmanuel Mouret, Julie Gayet, Michaël Cohen, Frédérique Bel, Stefano Accorsi

While traveling to Nantes for one evening, Emilie meets Gabriel. Equally seduced by one another, but both otherwise committed, they know they will probably never see each other again. He would like to kiss her. She as well, but a story prevents her from doing so: that of a married woman and of her best friend who were surprised by the effects of a kiss. Of a kiss that should have born no consequences

Technical Information
Production Year - 2007
Country of Production - France
Language - French with English subtitles
Running Time - 102 min
Screen Ratio - 1.85:1
Sound - Dolby digital
Rating - unrated
___________________________

This meetup is being organised by Stevie Worthington as part of a 6 part Meetup event for the Providence French Language Meetup group held in NEWPORT RI. If you can't make this night, hopefully you can make it to at least one of the other films in the Film festival on either 22 Mar, 24 Mar, 26 Mar, 29 Mar or 31 Mar.
Any questions, send Stevie an email - merci!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside the lobby from 6.30pm wearing a pink jacket holding a meetup sign

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Film Festival in Newport - Film 6 "Un baiser s'il vous plait/Shall We Kiss?"
